name: Git-in-Team
description: Let people invite themselves to your GitHub organization/team

GITHUB_API_TOKEN.description: A Github API token with access to the organization's adminstration

GITHUB_API_TYPE.description: A Github API token type (which is generally 'Bearer')

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: Client id of the registered application

GITHUB_APP_SECRET.description: Client secret of the registered application
